prompts:
7 AI-related columns to
  both tasks and task_subtasks tables:
    - ai_system_prompt - System context for AI agents
    - ai_request_prompt - Execution instructions
    - ai_work_context - Additional JSON context
    - ai_completion_criteria - Success criteria
    - ai_execution_history - Execution history tracking
    - ai_last_execution - Last execution timestamp
    - ai_model_preferences - Model configuration
you need check all layer DDD for assume is correct add on each layer, update description tool for new change
